thread.title: Rita Ora pays homage to late George Michael in LA
thread.title_full: Rita Ora pays homage to late George Michael in LA | Daily Mail Online

author: MailOnline Reporter
title: Rita Ora pays homage to late George Michael in LA
text:
She turned heads following her leggy display at the Fifty Shades Darker premiere earlier this week.
Yet, Rita Ora opted to use her fashion sense to pay tribute to a music idol as she stepped out in Beverly Hills in a t-shirt emblazoned with the late George Michael across the front.
The 26-year-old sported the clothing that paid homage to the Faith singer - who sadly past away on Christmas Day at home aged 53 - with two pictures of the star from the eighties displayed across it.
Scroll down for video
Tribute: Rita Ora opted to use her fashion sense to pay tribute to a music idol as she stepped out in Beverly Hills in a t-shirt emblazoned with the late George Michael across the front
Kick about in white trainers like Rita Ora in Adidas Adidas trainers
Shop similar pair here
Buy now
Rita Ora is one for following her own set of fashion rules. If that means she's in biker boots one minute, glamorous dresses and stilettos the next and trainers and tracksuits the next, we're okay with that. We love to see her play around with style.
Here she looked gym-ready, but what's not to love about her George Michael tee? And her white trainers by Adidas are pretty swish - you really can't beat a plain white pair and they also look great with dresses too.
Rita's exact pair are sold out, but click right to snap up a similar pair from the current line.
Alternatively, look white hot in one of the similar options line up below. From Nike Air Max to Asics Gels, you're sure to find something to your liking.
We'd love to see them style with a midi sweater dress to pull off cool daytime casuals.

The oversized tribute t-shirt hid Rita's renowned hourglass curves as she sauntered down the LA pavement in a pair of Adidas gleaming white trainers.
Teaming her tribute led ensemble, the Hot Right now hitmaker slipped into a pair of cropped skintight leggings that showcased her gym-honed pins to perfection.
The style maven accessorised her look with head-turning pink visor shades while she draped her mini Chanel over her shoulder as she carried her phone in her hand.
Rita opted to leave her golden mane in a straight style as it became tousled in the Californian breeze as she ran a number of errands around the city.
Paying homage: The 26-year-old sported the clothing that paid homage to the Faith singer - who sadly past away on Christmas Day - with two pictures of the star from the eighties displayed across it
Rita's appearance comes after she made quite the splash at the premiere for Fifty Shades Darker on Thursday night in Los Angeles.
While it was dubbed her big break in Hollywood but Rita's screen time in Fifty Shades of Grey amounts to no more than 90 seconds.
Although the singer has been heavily promoting her role during interviews throughout the past year, those who have seen initial screenings, ahead of the movie's release date, were puzzled at how little she had to say.
Rita , who has repeatedly called her role a cameo, plays Mia Grey, the adoptive sister of Jamie Dornan's kinky billionaire Christian Grey in the new flick.
And while she is undoubtedly one of the most beautiful popstars in the world, fans were less than impressed with her make-under for the movie.
After the first picture of her character was revealed last year, fans took to the movie's Facebook page to share their dismay.
Speaking to OK! magazine , she said: 'Everyone is going to have their own opinions. But for me this was such a great cameo to be involved in, and even though I'm only in it for a little bit, it's opened the door to a lot of movie things that I haven't actually announced yet.'
Fifty Shades Darker hits theatres on February 10 in the US and UK.
Underused! Rita has just 90 seconds of screentime in Fifty Shades Of Grey with critics calling her underused
